text.content: Click a Lesson or Activity to learn more about The Four Parenting Styles.
Emotion Coaching parents understand that it is important to try to understand how a child is feeling. These parents value sharing emotional times with their children.

Research suggests that:
  • Emotion Coaching is the parenting style that best nurtures a child's emotional development.

Children learn:
  • To understand their feelings
  • That feelings are important and can be trusted
  • How to manage strong emotions in a positive way

audio.transcript: Emotion Coaching is the fourth and most important parenting style. Emotion Coaching parents understand that it is important to try to understand how a child is feeling and these parents value sharing emotional times with their children.
Research suggests that Emotion Coaching is the parenting style that best nurtures a child's emotional development because it creates a foundation for a strong, healthy, trusting relationship.

To Emotion Coach, parents need to use empathy. Specifically, these parents try to put themselves into their child's shoes. They show an understanding of their children's emotions and guide them in their behavior.

Emotion Coaching takes practice. Every emotional event is different and Emotion Coaching needs to be flexible. None of us can do it all the time, but the more we can take the time to help children work through emotions, the better.

There are many benefits to Emotion Coaching. For example, children learn to understand their feelings. They learn that feelings are important and can be trusted, and they also learn how to manage strong emotions in a positive way. We will cover the steps and benefits of Emotion Coaching in more detail in the next module.
